name: Kessoku-the-Broadcaster
description: 专注于算法竞赛的直播推流软件

scripts.dev:electron: pnpm run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.dist:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac && npm run sign:mac
scripts.dist:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.dist:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.dist:mac:arm64: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64 && npm run sign:mac
scripts.dist:mac:x64: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --x64 && npm run sign:mac
scripts.dist:win:x64: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:win:arm64: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --arm64
scripts.dist:linux:x64: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.dist:linux:arm64: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --arm64
